Hi folks! I'd need to better understand what "replace the blog database means", but checking out the available blog APIs is probably the best route to get started. More information available <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/api/cms/blog-post?_ga=2.173759011.1659688095.1610241674-378068847.1595528357|here>.
